00034 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_VECTOR
00035 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_VECTOR
00036 
00037 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00038 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00040 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00041 #include <harps/normalize.hpp>
00042 #include <harps/shared_buffer.hpp>
00043 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00044 
00045 #include <boost/array.hpp>
00046 
00047 namespace harps {
00048   namespace compornent {
00049     template< unsigned int array_size >
00050       class Vector {
00051         public:
00052           Vector() {}
00053           struct Point {
00054             float x;
00055             float y;
00056           };
00057           virtual ~Vector() {}
00058           template< typename TagType, typename PointIterator >
00059             void init( PointIterator _begin, PointIterator _end ) {
00060               std::map< float, float > sorted;
00061               sorted[ 0.0f ] = 0.0f;
00062               for( ; _begin != _end; _begin++ )
00063                 sorted[ _begin->x ] = _begin->y;
00064               std::map< float, float >::const_iterator last_iter = sorted.end();
00065               last_iter--;
00066               total_time = last_iter->first;
00067               cache =
00068                 SharedBuffer< TagType, float, array_size >::init(
00069                   boost::bind( &Vector< array_size >::initInternal, _1, total_time, sorted )
00070                 );
00071             }
00072           static void initInternal(
00073             boost::array< float, array_size > &_dest,
00074             float total_time,
00075             const std::map< float, float > &_sorted
00076           ) {
00077             std::map< float, float >::const_iterator previous = sorted.begin();
00078             std::map< float, float >::const_iterator current = sorted.begin();
00079             current++;
00080             std::map< float, float >::const_iterator end = sorted.end();
00081             int index;
00082             for( ; current != end; previous = current, current++ ) {
00083               // y = ax + b
00084               float a = ( current->y - previous->y ) / ( current->x - previous->x );
00085               float b = -a * current->x + current->y;
00086               for( index = 0; index != _dest.size(); index++ ) {
00087                 double current_time = total_time * index / _dest.size();
00088                 _dest[ index ] = a * current_time + b;
00089               }
00090             }
00091           }
00092           template< typename SampleType >
00093             inline void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00094               int index;
00095               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00096               for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00097                 raw_buffer[ index ] = noteon_cache[ static_cast<int>( time / total_time * array_size ) ];
00098             }
00099       private:
00100         boost::array< float, array_size > &cache;
00101         float total_time
00102     };
00103   }
00104 }
